content: leggy frog skill level beginner materials ● #6 super bulky yarn ● 5 5mm hook ● 8mm safety eyes ● black and pink yarn ● scissors ● yarn needle ● fibrefill stuffing by zara s hookz leggy frog abbreviations ● single_crochet - single_crochet ● increase - increase ● chain - chain ● slip_stitch - slip_stitch ● fo - fasten_off ● stitch count shown in brackets at end of row ex 6 notes ● this pattern is made in continuous rounds ● a stitch marker should be used at the beginning of each round ● feel free to sell products made from this pattern but please credit me as the artist pattern body chain 6 1 starting in 2nd chain from hook 4 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet increase 12 2 5 single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet increase 14 3-8 single_crochet around 9 increase 6 single_crochet increase 6 single_crochet 16 10 2 increase 6 single_crochet 2 increase 6 single_crochet 18 slip_stitch fo insert safety eyes in between row 9 & 10 5 stitches apart stuff body sew top of frog shut by zara s hookz leggy frog legs for legs position them with one at each bottom corner on row 2 and then and then on either side of the body on row 6 create a slip_stitch on your hook and insert into body chain 13 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook ch1 single_crochet into previous stitch slip_stitch 11 down chain slip_stitch back into body and fo you should have 2 ends after creating a leg weave both of the ends to a random stitch tie 2 or 3 knots and stuff inside body repeat this same process for all 4 legs face details taking the black yarn stitch a smile over row 8 about 3 stitches wide take the pink yarn and stitch on the blush between row 8 and 9 at the corners of the smile by zara s hookz
